name: @qpress/cli
description: This is an extension of @qpress/core. Can be used to easily generate qpress applications and assets inside.

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run global
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.build: npm run clean:some && tsc -p . && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: mkdir dist && cp -r lib dist/lib && cp -r bin dist/bin && cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/
scripts.publish-package: npm version patch && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish
